Detailed Description

Implementation of the data for the IPDR Exporter MIB (internal.

Copyright (2005) © Amdocs, All Rights Reserved

This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND either expresses or implied.

Id:
ExporterMIB.c,v 1.26 2005/02/14 19:31:17 dmitryk Exp

The file contains the implementation of the IPDR Exporter (Transmitter) MIB. This includes updating the MIB with the current status of the client (transmitter) (sessions, servers and templates) and handling reconfiguration of the client (transmitter).

See also:
Common/MIBHandler.c , Common/MIBNames.h
Note:
We use the term "MIB", but it's not just for reporting via SNMP (in fact, the client (transmitter) code doesn't actually have anything for directly providing SNMP data; it does have the hooks IPDR_MIBGet(), IPDR_MIBGetNext(), and IPDR_MIBSet()). At least some of the data in the MIB is also used for configuring the client (transmitter) (e.g., when it is restarted).

Define Documentation

#define EXPORTER_MIB_VERSION   1

00117

00119     MIBHandler_Set(MH, & OID1, "0", XDR_TYPE_UINT, IPDR_TRUE);
00120

00134     MIBHandler_Get(MH, & OID1, & Name, & Type, NULL, NULL);
00135

00137         char buf[20];

00140         Priority = atoi(PriorityStr);
00141         Port = atoi(PortStr);

00143

00146             Status = IPDR_AddCollector(E, Name, Addr, Port, (unsigned short)Priority);
00147         }
00148         MIBHandler_Set(MH, & OID1, buf, XDR_TYPE_UINT, IPDR_TRUE);
00149         sprintf(buf, "%d", Status);
00150

00152                    ((Status == IPDR_OK) ? IPDR_LEVEL_INFO : IPDR_LEVEL_ERROR),

00154                    MSG_EXPORTER_MIB_CMD_ADD_SERVER,
00155                    IPDR_StatusMsg(E, Status),
00156                    SessionID,
00157                    SessionName,
00158                    SessionDescription,
00159                    Priority,

00162     } else {

00165                    IPDR_LEVEL_ERROR,

void ExporterMIB_ApplyLogSettings (  IPDR_OID *    OID,
MIBNode *    N,
void *    Arg
) 
 

Apply log configuration parameters within the MIB on the logging module.

Parameters:
OID  changed OID
N  MIB node
Arg  additional argument (client) 

01556 {
01557     IPDR_OID OID1;
01558     const char *Value;
01559     unsigned int Type;
01560     Module *M;
01561     Exporter *E = (Exporter *) Arg;
01562     MIBHandler *MH = & (E->ExporterMIB);
01563     int i ;
01564 
01565     MIBHandler_StringToOID(MH, STR_configuration_logging_loggerAddress, & OID1);
01566     MIBHandler_Get(MH, & OID1, & Value, & Type, NULL, NULL);
01567     if (Value != NULL)
01568         E->ExporterLog.LoggerAddr = TL_ParseAddress(Value);
01569     MIBHandler_StringToOID(MH, STR_configuration_logging_loggerPort, & OID1);
01570     MIBHandler_Get(MH, & OID1, & Value, & Type, NULL, NULL);
01571     if (Value != NULL)
01572         E->ExporterLog.LoggerPort = atoi(Value);
01573 
01574     /* update the modules debug levels */
01575     for (i = 0; i < E->ExporterLog.Modules.Length; i++) {
01576         char Buf[MAX_CONFIG_STR_LEN+1];
01577         M = (Module *) E->ExporterLog.Modules.Data[i];
01578         if (M == NULL)
01579             continue;
01580         sprintf(Buf, STR_configuration_logging_levels_moduleS, M->Name);
01581         MIBHandler_StringToOID(MH, Buf, & OID1);
01582         MIBHandler_Get(MH, & OID1, & Value, & Type, NULL, NULL);
01583         if (Value == NULL)
01584             continue;
01585         M->Level = atoi(Value);
01586     }
01587 }

void ExporterMIB_ApplySessionsSettings (  IPDR_OID *    OID,
MIBNode *    N,
void *    Arg
) 
 

Create sessions / servers (collectors) according to information stored within the MIB.

Parameters:
OID  changed OID
N  MIB node
Arg  additional argument (client) 

01491 {
01492     char **SessionIDs, **SessionNames, **SessionDescriptions;
01493     char **ServerSessionIDs, **ServerNames, **ServerAddresses;
01494     char **ServerPorts, **ServerPriorities;
01495     int NumSessions, NumServers, i;
01496     Exporter *E = (Exporter *) Arg;
01497     MIBHandler *MH = & (E->ExporterMIB);
01498     IPDR_SessionHandle SH;
01499 
01500     SessionIDs = MIBHandler_GetChildValues(MH, & SessionIDOID,
01501                                            & NumSessions);
01502     SessionNames = MIBHandler_GetChildValues(MH, & SessionNameOID,
01503                                              & NumSessions);
01504     SessionDescriptions =
01505         MIBHandler_GetChildValues(MH,
01506                                   & SessionDescriptionOID,
01507                                   & NumSessions);
01508     if (SessionIDs && SessionNames && SessionDescriptions) {
01509         for (i = 0; i < NumSessions; i++)
01510             Exporter_CreateSessionInternal(E, SessionNames[i], atoi(SessionIDs[i]),
01511                                          SessionDescriptions[i], & SH);
01512     }
01513 
01514     ServerSessionIDs = MIBHandler_GetChildValues(MH, & ServerSessionIDOID,
01515                                                  & NumServers);
01516     ServerNames = MIBHandler_GetChildValues(MH, & ServerNameOID, & NumServers);
01517     ServerAddresses = MIBHandler_GetChildValues(MH, & ServerAddressOID,
01518                                                 & NumServers);
01519     ServerPorts = MIBHandler_GetChildValues(MH, & ServerPortOID, & NumServers);
01520     ServerPriorities = MIBHandler_GetChildValues(MH, & ServerPriorityOID,
01521                                                  & NumServers);
01522 
01523     if (ServerSessionIDs && ServerNames && ServerAddresses && ServerPorts &&
01524         ServerPriorities) {
01525         for (i = 0; i < NumServers; i++) {
01526             if (IPDR_GetSession(E, atoi(ServerSessionIDs[i]), & SH, NULL, NULL) != IPDR_OK)
01527                 continue ;
01528             Exporter_AddCollectorInternal(E, /*SH,*/ ServerNames[i],
01529                                      TL_ParseAddress(ServerAddresses[i]),
01530                                      atoi(ServerPorts[i]),
01531                                      1 /*atoi(ServerPriorities[i])*/);
01532         }
01533     }
01534 
01535     Platform_MemoryFree(MH->PS, SessionIDs);
01536     Platform_MemoryFree(MH->PS, SessionNames);
01537     Platform_MemoryFree(MH->PS, SessionDescriptions);
01538 
01539     Platform_MemoryFree(MH->PS, ServerSessionIDs);
01540     Platform_MemoryFree(MH->PS, ServerNames);
01541     Platform_MemoryFree(MH->PS, ServerAddresses);
01542     Platform_MemoryFree(MH->PS, ServerPorts);
01543     Platform_MemoryFree(MH->PS, ServerPriorities);
01544 }

void ExporterMIB_CommandStringCallback (  IPDR_OID *    OID,
MIBNode *    N,
void *    Arg
)  [static]
 

Callback when the MIB configurationCommandString is modified. The string is executed, with the result written to the log.

Parameters:
OID  The OID for the node.
N  The MIB node.
Arg  An extra parameter set up when the callback was registered: a Exporter pointer 

00361 {
00362     Exporter *E = (Exporter *)Arg;
00363     MIBHandler *MH = & (E->ExporterMIB);
00364 
00365     if (N->Value && N->Value[0] != '\0') {
00366         char *cmdCopy;
00367         IPDR_Status rc;
00368         IPDR_OID resultOID;
00369 
00370         MIBHandler_StringToOID(MH, STR_commands_configurationCommandResult, &resultOID);
00371 
00372         /* We need to copy the MIB value because Activate Command
00373          * smashes it; and also because the command itself might
00374          * change this value (e.g., add_server re-builds this
00375          * command string). */
00376         Util_StrDup(E->PS, N->Value, &cmdCopy);
00377         rc = Console_ActivateCommand(&E->ConsolePtr, NULL, NULL,
00378                                      cmdCopy, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00379         if (rc == IPDR_OK) {
00380             MIBHandler_Set(MH, &resultOID, "OK", XDR_TYPE_STRING, IPDR_FALSE);
00381         } else {
00382             MIBHandler_Set(MH, &resultOID, IPDR_StatusMsg(E, rc), XDR_TYPE_STRING, IPDR_FALSE);
00383         }
00384         Log_Write2(EXPORTER_LOG, EXPORTER_MODULE_ID,
00385                    ((rc == IPDR_OK) ? IPDR_LEVEL_INFO : IPDR_LEVEL_ERROR),
00386                    "ExporterMIB_CommandStringCallback",
00387                    MSG_EXPORTER_MIB_CMD_COMMAND,
00388                    ((rc == IPDR_OK) ? "(OK)" : IPDR_StatusMsg(E, rc)), N->Value);
00389         Object_Release(E->PS, cmdCopy);
00390     }
00391 }

00539     Value = ParametersHandler_GetStringParam(PH, Str, DefaultValue);
00540     MIBHandler_StringToOID(MH, Str, & OID);
00541     MIBHandler_Set(MH, & OID, Value, Type, IPDR_TRUE);
00542     return IPDR_OK;
00543 }

TemplateChangeBlockHeader* ExporterMIB_GetTemplateChangedBlocks (  Exporter *    E,
Session *    S,
int *    NumTemplates
) 
 

Get an array of template change blocks containing information about key attributes as stored in the MIB.

Parameters:
E  exporter handle
S  session
NumTemplates  number of templates (output)
Returns:
Buffer containing template change blocks (the receiver is responsible for freeing this buffer) 

01619 {
01620 #ifdef NOTDONEYET
01621     unsigned int AllocationSize, i;
01622     int NumEntries, CurrentTemplateID, TemplateID, NumKeys;
01623     char **KeyIDs, **TemplateIDs, **SessionIDs, **KeyAttributes;
01624     IPDR_Status Status;
01625     char *Buf, *Ptr;
01626     TemplateChangeBlockHeader *TCB;
01627     KeyBlock *KB;
01628     MIBHandler *MH = & (E->ExporterMIB);
01629 
01630     KeyIDs= MIBHandler_GetChildValues(MH, & KeyAttributesKeyIDOID,
01631                                       & NumEntries);
01632     TemplateIDs = MIBHandler_GetChildValues(MH, & KeyAttributesTemplateIDOID,
01633                                             & NumEntries);
01634     SessionIDs = MIBHandler_GetChildValues(MH, & KeyAttributesSessionIDOID,
01635                                            & NumEntries);
01636     KeyAttributes = MIBHandler_GetChildValues(MH, & KeyAttributesOID,
01637                                               & NumEntries);
01638 
01639     if (! KeyIDs || ! TemplateIDs || ! SessionIDs || ! KeyAttributes)
01640         return NULL;
01641 
01642     CurrentTemplateID = -1;
01643     *NumTemplates = 0;
01644     AllocationSize = 0;
01645 
01646     /* find the required allocation size */
01647     for (i = 0; i < NumEntries; i++) {
01648 
01649         /* if the entry doesn't belong to the current session, skip it */
01650         if (atoi(SessionIDs[i]) != S->ID)
01651             continue;
01652 
01653         /* in case the template has changed, add the header size to the
01654            allocation size */
01655 
01656         TemplateID = atoi(TemplateIDs[i]);
01657         if (TemplateID != CurrentTemplateID) {
01658             CurrentTemplateID = TemplateID;
01659             AllocationSize += sizeof(TemplateChangeBlockHeader);
01660             (*NumTemplates)++;
01661         }
01662 
01663         AllocationSize += sizeof(KeyBlock);
01664     }
01665 
01666     Status = Platform_MEMORYALLOCATESIZE(E->PS, AllocationSize, Buf);
01667     if (Status == IPDR_OK) {
01668 
01669         CurrentTemplateID = -1;
01670         Ptr = Buf;
01671 
01672         for (i = 0; i < NumEntries; i++) {
01673 
01674             /* if the entry doesn't belong to the current session, skip it */
01675             if (atoi(SessionIDs[i]) != S->ID)
01676                 continue;
01677 
01678             TemplateID = atoi(TemplateIDs[i]);
01679             if (TemplateID != CurrentTemplateID) {
01680 
01681                 CurrentTemplateID = TemplateID;
01682                 TCB = (TemplateChangeBlockHeader *) Ptr;
01683                 IPDR_SET_HTONS(TCB->TemplateID, (short) TemplateID);
01684                 NumKeys = 0;
01685                 Ptr += sizeof(TemplateChangeBlockHeader);
01686 
01687                 for ( ; i < NumEntries; i++) {
01688                     if (atoi(TemplateIDs[i]) != CurrentTemplateID)
01689                         break ;
01690                     NumKeys++;
01691                     KB = (KeyBlock *) Ptr;
01692                     IPDR_SET_HTONL(KB->KeyID, atoi(KeyIDs[i]));
01693                     IPDR_SET_HTONL(KB->KeyAttributes, atoi(KeyAttributes[i]));
01694                     Ptr += sizeof(KeyBlock);
01695                 }
01696                 IPDR_SET_HTONS(TCB->NumKeys, (short) NumKeys);
01697             }
01698         }
01699     } else {
01700         X_MEMPANICSIZE(AllocationSize, __FILE__, __LINE__);
01701         Buf = NULL;
01702     }
01703 
01704     Platform_MemoryFree(E->PS, KeyIDs);
01705     Platform_MemoryFree(E->PS, TemplateIDs);
01706     Platform_MemoryFree(E->PS, SessionIDs);
01707     Platform_MemoryFree(E->PS, KeyAttributes);
01708 
01709     return (TemplateChangeBlockHeader *) Buf;
01710 #else
01711         return NULL;
01712 #endif
01713 }

void ExporterMIB_LogSettingsChanged (  void *    Arg )  [static]
 

Callback for when the log settings change.

const char* ExporterMIB_ParametersHandlerFunc (  const char *    Name,
void *    Arg
)  [static]
 

Callback function used to abstract the MIB as a params handler (this actually directs a parameter request to the MIB).

Parameters:
Name  parameter name.
Arg  extra argument (the client)
Returns:
Parameter's value (string) 

00405 {
00406     IPDR_OID OID;
00407     const char *Value = NULL;
00408     unsigned int Type;
00409 
00410     Exporter *E = (Exporter *) Arg;
00411     MIBHandler *MH = & (E->ExporterMIB);
00412 
00413     MIBHandler_StringToOID(MH, Name, & OID);
00414 
00415     if (MIBHandler_Get(MH, & OID, & Value, & Type, NULL, NULL) != IPDR_OK) {
00416         Value = NULL; /* Note: NULL is a possible return value from
00417                        * MIBHandler_Get, for a node that hasn't had
00418                        * its value set yet. */
00419     }
00420         if(Value == NULL && E && E->ParamsHandler.ParamsFunc && E->ParamsHandler.ParamsArg)
00421         {
00422                 Value = E->ParamsHandler.ParamsFunc(Name, E->ParamsHandler.ParamsArg);
00423         }
00424     return Value;
00425 }

void ExporterMIB_RemoveServerCallback (  IPDR_OID *    OID,
MIBNode *    N,
void *    Arg
)  [static]
 

Callback triggered whenever the value of the remove server (collector) command is executed using the MIB.

Parameters:
OID  changed OID
N  MIB node
Arg  additional argument (the IPDR client) 

00193 {
00194     Exporter *E = (Exporter *) Arg;
00195     MIBHandler *MH = & (E->ExporterMIB);
00196     IPDR_OID OID1;
00197     const char *Value;
00198     unsigned int Type;
00199     int SessionID, Port;
00200     const char *SessionName;
00201     const char *SessionDescription;
00202     IPDR_Status Status;
00203     IPDR_IPAddress Addr;
00204     IPDR_SessionHandle SH;
00205     char buf[20];
00206     TL_PABuf paBuf;
00207 
00208     MIBHandler_StringToOID(MH, STR_commands_removeServer_removeServerExecute,
00209                            & OID1);
00210 
00211     MIBHandler_StringToOID(MH, STR_commands_removeServer_removeServerSessionID,
00212                            & OID1);
00213     MIBHandler_Get(MH, & OID1, & Value, & Type, NULL, NULL);
00214     SessionID = atoi(Value);
00215 
00216     MIBHandler_StringToOID(MH, STR_commands_removeServer_removeServerPort, & OID1);
00217     MIBHandler_Get(MH, & OID1, & Value, & Type, NULL, NULL);
00218     Port = atoi(Value);
00219 
00220     MIBHandler_StringToOID(MH, STR_commands_removeServer_removeServerAddress,
00221                            & OID1);

00223     Addr = TL_ParseAddress(Value);
00224 
00225     Status = IPDR_GetSession(E, SessionID, & SH, &SessionName, &SessionDescription);
00226     if (Status == IPDR_OK) {
00227             IPDR_RemoveCollector(E, NULL);
00228     }
00229 
00230     sprintf(buf, "%d", Status);
00231     MIBHandler_Set(MH, & OID1, buf, XDR_TYPE_UINT, IPDR_TRUE);
00232 
00233     Log_Write5(EXPORTER_LOG, EXPORTER_MODULE_ID,
00234                ((Status == IPDR_OK) ? IPDR_LEVEL_INFO : IPDR_LEVEL_ERROR),
00235                "ExporterMIB_RemoveServerCallback",
00236                MSG_EXPORTER_MIB_CMD_REMOVE_SERVER,
00237                IPDR_StatusMsg(E, Status), SessionID, SessionName, SessionDescription,
00238                TL_PrintAddressAndPort(Addr, Port, paBuf));
00239 }

MIBNode *    N,
void *    Arg
)  [static]
 

Callback triggered whenever the value of the remove session command is executed using the MIB.

OID  changed OID
N  MIB node

00344                ((Status == IPDR_OK) ? IPDR_LEVEL_INFO : IPDR_LEVEL_ERROR),

IPDR_Status ExporterMIB_UpdateKeyAttributes (  Exporter *    E ) 
 

Update the key attributes table within the MIB.

Parameters:
E  exporter
Returns:
IPDR_OK on success; IPDR_STATUS_RETURN_CODE otherwise. 

01399 {
01400 #ifdef NOTDONEYET
01401     MIBHandler *MH = & (E->ExporterMIB);
01402     Session *S;
01403     Template *Tmpl;
01404     Key *K;
01405     TransmissionContext *TC;
01406     int i, j, k;
01407     char SessionID[20], TemplateID[20];
01408 
01409     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, & KeyAttributesKeyIDOID);
01410     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, & KeyAttributesTemplateIDOID);
01411     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, & KeyAttributesSessionIDOID);
01412     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, & KeyAttributesOID);
01413 
01414     for (i = 0; i < E->Sessions.Length; i++) {
01415         S = (Session *) E->Sessions.Data[i];
01416         TC = S->ActiveContext;
01417         if (TC == NULL)
01418             continue ;
01419         sprintf(SessionID, "%d", S->ID);
01420         for (j = 0; j < TC->Templates.Length; j++) {
01421             Tmpl = (Template *) TC->Templates.Data[j];
01422             if (Tmpl == NULL)
01423                 continue;
01424             sprintf(TemplateID, "%d", Tmpl->TemplateID);
01425             for (k = 0; k < Tmpl->Keys.Length; k++) {
01426                 K = (Key *) Tmpl->Keys.Data[k];
01427                 if (K == NULL)
01428                     continue;
01429                 ExporterMIB_AddTableNode(MH, & KeyAttributesSessionIDOID, SessionID,
01430                                        XDR_TYPE_UINT);
01431                 ExporterMIB_AddTableNode(MH, & KeyAttributesTemplateIDOID, TemplateID,
01432                                        XDR_TYPE_UINT);
01433                 ExporterMIB_AddTableNodeUint32(MH, & KeyAttributesKeyIDOID, K->KeyID);
01434                 ExporterMIB_AddTableNodeUint32(MH, & KeyAttributesOID, K->Attributes);
01435             }
01436         }
01437     }
01438 #endif
01439     return IPDR_OK;
01440 }

IPDR_Status ExporterMIB_UpdateServers (  Exporter *    E ) 
 

Update the servers (collectors) table within the MIB.

Parameters:
E  exporter handle
Returns:
IPDR_OK on success; IPDR_STATUS_RETURN_CODE otherwise. 

01275 {
01276 #ifdef NOTDONEYET
01277     int i;
01278     int serverI = 0;
01279     MIBHandler *MH = & (E->ExporterMIB);
01280     const char* sep = "";
01281     char cmdString[2000]; /* XXX should be enough ... but careful
01282                            * programming would dynamically allocate
01283                            * this and test for overflow peoperly (so,
01284                            * no sprintf). There's better code in the
01285                            * log module. */
01286 
01287     /* Note: return codes aren't checked here; but they should be
01288        because memory is being deallocated and allocated */
01289     cmdString[0] = '\0';
01290 
01291     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, &ServerSessionIDOID);            /*  1 */
01292     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, &ServerAddressOID);              /*  2 */
01293     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, &ServerPortOID);                 /*  3 */
01294     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, &ServerNameOID);                 /*  4 */
01295     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, &ServerPriorityOID);             /*  5 */
01296 
01297     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, &ServerTransmittedRecordsOID);   /*  6 */
01298     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, &ServerAcknowledgedRecordsOID);  /*  7 */
01299     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, &ServerEnqueuedRecordsOID);      /*  8 */
01300     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, &ServerLostRecordsOID);          /*  9 */
01301     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, &ServerStatusOID);               /* 10 */
01302 
01303     for (i = 0; i < E->Sessions.Length; i++) {
01304         int j;
01305         Session *S = (Session *) E->Sessions.Data[i];
01306         sprintf(cmdString+strlen(cmdString), "%sadd_session %u '%.99s' '%.199s'",
01307                 sep, S->ID, S->Name, S->Description);
01308         sep = "; ";
01309         for (j = 0; j < S->Servers.Length; j++) {
01310             TL_PABuf paBuf;
01311             Server *Srv = (Server *) S->Servers.Data[j];
01312             serverI++;
01313 
01314             sprintf(cmdString+strlen(cmdString), "%sadd_server %u '%.99s' %.50s %d %d",
01315                     sep, S->ID,
01316                     Srv->ConnSettings.Name,
01317                     TL_PrintAddress(Srv->ConnSettings.Addr, paBuf),
01318                     Srv->ConnSettings.Port,
01319                     Srv->ConnSettings.Priority);
01320 
01321             ExporterMIB_AddTableNodeUint32(MH, & ServerSessionIDOID, S->ID);
01322             ExporterMIB_AddTableNode(MH, & ServerAddressOID,
01323                                    TL_PrintAddress(Srv->ConnSettings.Addr, paBuf),
01324                                    XDR_TYPE_IPV4ADDR);
01325             ExporterMIB_AddTableNodeUint32(MH, & ServerPortOID,
01326                                          Srv->ConnSettings.Port);
01327             ExporterMIB_AddTableNode(MH, & ServerNameOID,
01328                                    Srv->ConnSettings.Name, XDR_TYPE_STRING);
01329             ExporterMIB_AddTableNodeUint32(MH, & ServerPriorityOID,
01330                                          Srv->ConnSettings.Priority);
01331             ExporterMIB_AddStatisticsNode(E, ServerTransmittedStatisticsCallback,  Srv, serverI, &ServerTransmittedRecordsOID);
01332             ExporterMIB_AddStatisticsNode(E, ServerAcknowledgedStatisticsCallback, Srv, serverI, &ServerAcknowledgedRecordsOID);
01333             ExporterMIB_AddStatisticsNode(E, ServerEnqueuedStatisticsCallback,     Srv, serverI, &ServerEnqueuedRecordsOID);
01334             ExporterMIB_AddStatisticsNode(E, ServerLostStatisticsCallback,         Srv, serverI, &ServerLostRecordsOID);
01335             {
01336                 IPDR_OID OIDindex = ServerStatusOID;
01337                 ExporterMIB_AddTableNode(MH, &ServerStatusOID, "???", XDR_TYPE_STRING);
01338                 OIDindex.OIDArray[OIDindex.Length++] = serverI;
01339                 MIBHandler_SetValueCallback(MH, &OIDindex, ServerStatusStatisticsCallback, Srv);
01340             }
01341         }
01342     }
01343 
01344     MIBHandler_Set(MH, &ConfigurationCommandStringOID, cmdString, XDR_TYPE_STRING, IPDR_TRUE);
01345 #endif
01346     return IPDR_OK;
01347 }

IPDR_Status ExporterMIB_UpdateSessions (  Exporter *    E ) 
 

Update the sessions table within the MIB.

Parameters:
E  exporter handle
Returns:
IPDR_OK on success; IPDR_STATUS_RETURN_CODE otherwise. 

01358 {
01359     MIBHandler *MH = & (E->ExporterMIB);
01360     int i;
01361 
01362     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, &SessionIDOID);                    /* 1 */
01363     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, &SessionNameOID);                  /* 2 */
01364     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, &SessionDescriptionOID);           /* 3 */
01365 
01366     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, &SessionTransmittedRecordsOID);    /* 4 */
01367     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, &SessionAcknowledgedRecordsOID);   /* 5 */
01368     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, &SessionEnqueuedRecordsOID);       /* 6 */
01369     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, &SessionLostRecordsOID);           /* 7 */
01370     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, &SessionOutstandingRecordsOID);    /* 8 */
01371     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, &SessionUnacknowledgedRecordsOID); /* 9 */
01372 
01373     for (i = 0; i < E->Sessions.Length; i++) {
01374         Session *S = (Session *) E->Sessions.Data[i];
01375         ExporterMIB_AddTableNodeUint32(MH, &SessionIDOID, S->ID);
01376         ExporterMIB_AddTableNode(MH, &SessionNameOID, S->Name, XDR_TYPE_STRING);
01377         ExporterMIB_AddTableNode(MH, &SessionDescriptionOID, S->Description,
01378                                XDR_TYPE_STRING);
01379         ExporterMIB_AddStatisticsNode(E, SessionTransmittedStatisticsCallback,    S, i+1, &SessionTransmittedRecordsOID);
01380         ExporterMIB_AddStatisticsNode(E, SessionAcknowledgedStatisticsCallback,   S, i+1, &SessionAcknowledgedRecordsOID);
01381         ExporterMIB_AddStatisticsNode(E, SessionEnqueuedStatisticsCallback,       S, i+1, &SessionEnqueuedRecordsOID);
01382         ExporterMIB_AddStatisticsNode(E, SessionLostStatisticsCallback,           S, i+1, &SessionLostRecordsOID);
01383         ExporterMIB_AddStatisticsNode(E, SessionOutstandingStatisticsCallback,    S, i+1, &SessionOutstandingRecordsOID);
01384         ExporterMIB_AddStatisticsNode(E, SessionUnacknowledgedStatisticsCallback, S, i+1, &SessionUnacknowledgedRecordsOID);
01385     }
01386 
01387     return IPDR_OK;
01388 }

IPDR_Status ExporterMIB_UpdateTemplates (  Session *    S )

S  session handle

IPDR_OK on success; IPDR_STATUS_RETURN_CODE otherwise. 

01199 {

01207     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, & TemplateDescriptionOID);
01208     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, & KeyIDOID);
01209     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, & KeyTemplateIDOID);
01210     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, & KeyNameOID);

01212     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, & KeyHelpOID);
01213     MIBHandler_RemoveChildren(MH, & KeyTypeIDOID);

01216         Tmpl = (Template *) S->Templates.Data[i];
01217         if (Tmpl == NULL)
01218             continue ;

01221         /*ExporterMIB_AddTableNode(MH, & TemplateDescriptionOID, Tmpl->Description,
01222                                XDR_TYPE_STRING);*/
01223 
01224         for (j = 0; j < Tmpl->Keys.Length; j++) {
01225             K = (Key *) Tmpl->Keys.Data[j];
01226             if (K == NULL)
01227                 continue;
01228 
01229             ExporterMIB_AddTableNodeUint32(MH, & KeyIDOID, K->KeyID);
01230             ExporterMIB_AddTableNodeUint32(MH, & KeyTemplateIDOID, Tmpl->TemplateID);
01231             ExporterMIB_AddTableNode(MH, & KeyNameOID, K->Name, XDR_TYPE_STRING);
01232             ExporterMIB_AddTableNode(MH, & KeyLabelOID, K->Label, XDR_TYPE_STRING);
01233             ExporterMIB_AddTableNode(MH, & KeyHelpOID, K->Help, XDR_TYPE_STRING);
01234             ExporterMIB_AddTableNodeUint32(MH, & KeyTypeIDOID, K->KeyTypeID);
01235         }
01236     }
01237     return IPDR_OK;
01238 }
